mapper.insert: INSERT INTO linker.card (title, u_id, cl_id) VALUES (#{title}, #{u_id}, #{cl_id})
mapper.select: SELECT c.id , c.u_id , c.title , c.content , c.cdate , c.udate , c.cl_id , c.ps_id , cl.p_id FROM linker.card c INNER JOIN linker.cardlist cl ON c.cl_id=cl.id WHERE p_id = #{p_id} AND c.ps_id = #{ps_id} ORDER BY udate DESC

SELECT c.id , c.u_id , c.title , c.content , c.cdate , c.udate , c.cl_id , c.ps_id , cl.p_id FROM linker.card c INNER JOIN linker.cardlist cl ON c.cl_id=cl.id WHERE p_id = #{p_id} AND c.cl_id = #{cl_id} AND c.ps_id = 1 ORDER BY udate DESC

SELECT c.id , c.u_id , c.title , c.content , c.cdate , c.udate , c.cl_id , c.ps_id , cl.p_id , cl.ps_id AS cl_ps_id , u.nickname , u.profile FROM linker.card c INNER JOIN linker.cardlist cl ON c.cl_id = cl.id INNER JOIN linker.user u ON c.u_id = u.id WHERE c.id = #{id}
SELECT f.id , f.file , f.c_id , c.ps_id , f.cdate , f.size FROM linker.c_file f LEFT JOIN linker.card c ON f.c_id = c.id WHERE c_id = #{c_id} ORDER BY f.cdate DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO linker.c_file(file, c_id, size) VALUES (#{file}, #{c_id}, #{size})
